subject: URGENT: Burning Smell from SalonMax AirFlow Dryer
body:
Hello,

My SalonMax AirFlow (Model SMA-300) emits a burning smell within seconds of switching on. I stopped using it immediately due to safety concerns. This is extremely alarming. I request immediate assistance under warranty.

Sincerely,
John Doe
Phone: +1-555-003-3003
Email: john.doe@gmail.com
